column4: i think my problem is related to: https://launchpad.net/avahi/+bug/72728/+viewstatus
my ubuntu doesnt seem to be abke to resolve dns queries
if i change my dns from the router's internal dns (192.168.1.1) to a public one (141.1.1.1) it works
cat /etc/resolv.conf    on most home systems you should have one entry like nameserver 192.168.1.1 or something
